tool_description: We're providing developer-friendly API's to major low cost and full service carriers with capabilities to search, price and book flights realtime. We directly dive into the inventory of airlines and GDS partners.
name: Flight Bookings
title: Flight Bookings

api_list.name: /sandboxapi/flights/v1.1/search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airhob-api.p.rapidapi.com/sandboxapi/flights/v1.1/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airhob-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Price
api_list.description: This API is used for locking the flight price and storing the traveler information to create a PNR (Passenger Name Record).
api_list.code:

url = "https://airhob-api.p.rapidapi.com/sandboxapi/flights/v1/price"

headers = {

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Issue
api_list.description: This API is used for finally issuing the ticket and creating the ticket number for each traveler.
